definition: Ji'an prefecture-level city in Jiangxi/also Ji'an County/Ji'an or Chi'an township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
lucky/giga- (meaning billion or 10^9)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
Ji'an prefecture-level city in Jiangxi
Ji'an county in Ji'an 吉安, Jiangxi
Ji'an prefecture in Jiangxi
Ji'an or Chi'an township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan

sentences.english: Slipping out of the village I headed for the city of Jian.
sentences.chinese: 我悄悄溜出村，向吉安县城走去。

sentences.english: Asamoah Gyan scored Ghana's crucial second goal.
sentences.chinese: 加纳队的吉安踢进了关键的第二个进球。

sentences.english: Marcion came to Rome from Asia Minor.
sentences.chinese: 马吉安从小亚细亚来到罗马。

sentences.english: As for the Korengal Valley, Giunta was right.
sentences.chinese: 对于科伦加尔山谷，吉安达是正确的。

sentences.english: Marcion was this guy from Asia Minor,modern day Turkey, and just get used to that term.
sentences.chinese: 马吉安来自小亚细亚，现在的土耳其，要熟悉这个词。

sentences.english: Wang spent six years of his early childhood living on the Hulun Buir Prairie.
sentences.chinese: 王吉安在呼伦贝尔大草原度过了六年的童年时光。
是的，马吉安，他死于主后160年左右。

sentences.english: If you didn't accept Marcion's canon,his list, what was going to be your list?
sentences.chinese: 如果你不接受马吉安的正典书目，那你的书目是什么？

sentences.english: When I fell, Giunta thought I was hit.
sentences.chinese: 当我倒下时，吉安达以为我被射中了。

sentences.english: Because Paul was Marcion's fave,fave apostle.
sentences.chinese: 因为保罗是马吉安最喜欢的使徒。

sentences.english: The only reason they didn’t take more casualties, he said, was Giunta and Gallardo.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有更多的伤亡，完全是因为吉安达和盖拉多。

sentences.english: Gyan thanked the whole of Africa for voting for him.
sentences.chinese: 吉安感谢投票支持他的全非洲人民。

sentences.english: With a gun to Zhang Jian Chou, cattle suddenly shouted "Dan niang".
sentences.chinese: 张吉安用枪指着秋香时，牛旦突然喊了声“娘”。

sentences.english: Slipping out of the village in the dark, I headed for Ji'an.
sentences.chinese: 我在黑夜中溜出村子，朝吉安向走去。

sentences.english: Marcion seemed to know only ten of them.
sentences.chinese: 马吉安似乎只知道有十封。

sentences.english: He attacks Marcion for mutilating St. Luke's Gospel.
sentences.chinese: 他的攻击马吉安为损毁圣卢克的福音。
